title: James Garner Of 'Rockford Files' And 'Maverick' Dies At 86
teaser: Garner was known for wise-cracking, tough-guy characters who were not afraid to bend the rules. NPR's Arun Rath talks with biographer Jon Winokur about the actor's prolific career.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
